transcript_chunks.text: Tiano Reeves joins Sonic the Hedgehog 3 as Shadow the Hedgehog Roger you're the number one Shadow the Hedgehog fan we need to give Shadow the Hedgehog a gun we have the king of gunfu and we need to give this guy a gun I don't care if this gun shoots laser beams ice I don't give a he needs a gun everybody and that is the number one thing we need to figure out as a [Music] country victory
